sys0003:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Fire!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Hehehe.<sp:5:0:0> Even though this is just practice,
my heart still races when I imagine firing
the cannon!
sys0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>I... I just thought we could fire off a
celebratory, one-cannon salute... <sp:5:1:0>
Also, the voe did it.
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hehehe!<sp:5:0:0> I'm allowed to fire the cannon
again! 

This calls for a celebratory, one-cannon
salute, obviously! Now where should I
fire it...
sys0017:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_00>I don't want to hear it, Barta!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


If that cannon gets fired every time there
is something to celebrate, the town will
be leveled before long!
Until I say otherwise, you are forbidden
from even touching that thing!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk10:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Aaah! Be careful!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>Can't you tell when someone is deeply
focused on a dangerous task? Cannons
demand the utmost care when handling!
I may only be practicing right now,
but if my hand slipped, I could <clr:0000>set off
the cannon<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Don't talk to me again. It could be bad.
Really bad!
sys0005:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>HEY! Barta! What are you doing?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>This <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff> isn't just some hole in the
ground. It has historical significance!
What are you even...<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
sys0018: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>What?! But...but I need to fire it...
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>OK, you Gibdo jerks! Do your worst!


I, the incredible Barta, am going to reduce
each and every one of you to dust!

I've been training my body and mind while
we were underground, and I am ready to
wipe you out!
sys0019: <sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Ugh!<sp:5:0:0> Why?<sp:5:0:0> Why do you keep doing that?
sys0007: <sp:3:0:2:0900>We're done! I hope we never speak again!
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Center carefully...<sp:5:1:0>and FIRE!
Aim right for the noggin...<sp:5:1:0>and FIRE!

Hehehe! I don't care what everyone else
says—<sp:5:1:0>Gibdos are still just monsters, and a
monster's head is always a weak point!
sys0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Hey! Hey! This is your fault!


Just unbelievable!<sp:5:0:0> This is exactly why we
are so wary of voe!
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hehehe! It looks like you did just about as
well as me and my little friend here.

Since you've been so helpful, I'll let you
fire off a one-cannon salute whenever
you like.
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Powder? Check. <sp:5:0:0>Cannonball? Check.<sp:5:0:0> Aim
barrel at target? Check.<sp:5:0:0> Finally, start the
countdown.
<sp:0:2:2:5000>Three...<sp:5:1:0>two...<sp:5:1:0>one...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What do you want?! I haven't forgotten
the trouble you got me into before!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But... <sp:5:1:0>OK, if you defeat more enemies
than I do during this battle, I could see
my way to forgiving you.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>And I have to admit it—I really, really
enjoyed firing the cannon in the moment.
I've been itching to do it again.
sys0021:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>HEY! Barta!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>This <clr:0000>shelter<clr:ffff> is an important piece of our
history! What are you doing firing that
off down here?!
Talk17:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You've got some nerve just walking up to
me like we're friends! I haven't forgotten
the trouble you got me into before!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But... <sp:5:1:0>OK, I'll admit that you really helped
in the battle against the Gibdos.

And besides... I guess I owe you for
making me realize how much I'd enjoy
actually firing this cannon.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>Since you've been so helpful, I'll let you
fire off a one-cannon salute whenever
you like.
sys0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You're much too dangerous to even
talk to!
sys0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>What... What are you going to do about
that wall?!
sys0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>How am I going to explain a blown-up wall
to Lady Riju...
sys0015:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>HEY! Barta! What are you doing?<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>It's way too dangerous to fire that thing
off here!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ah! Nuh uh, no! That cannon is off-limits.


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm being very, very patient. Just waiting
for the day when I'm allowed to fire that
cannon again.
I can almost smell the smoke now.
Ooo, I'm so excited!
